name: Forklift Driving Simulator VR Demo
summary: Forklift is a useful and powerful industrial truck used to lift and move materials over short distances, which is also called lift truck, fork truck, fork hoist and forklift truck. Forklifts have become an indispensable piece of equipment in manufacturing and warehousing.  Up for a real forklift gaming experience? We worked really hard and thoroughly to enable you great forklift simulator realistic graphics in one of the best forklift games.
